h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: As soon as you approach the large figure, the boss fight against Captain Lotus-Vision will begin.

As soon as you approach the large figure, the boss fight against Captain Lotus-Vision will begin.
